scripts.build: npm run plugin:setup && cd headlamp && make app
scripts.build:linux: npm run plugin:setup && cd headlamp && make app-linux
scripts.build:mac: npm run plugin:setup && cd headlamp && make app-mac
scripts.build:win: npm run plugin:setup && cd headlamp && make app-win
scripts.build:win-ci: npm run plugin:setup && cd headlamp && make app-win
scripts.build:unpacked: npm run plugin:setup && cd headlamp && make app-build
scripts.build:unpacked:linux: npm run plugin:setup && cd headlamp && make app-build
scripts.build:unpacked:mac: npm run plugin:setup && cd headlamp && make app-build
scripts.build:unpacked:win: npm run plugin:setup && cd headlamp && make app-build
scripts.headlamp:install: cd headlamp/frontend && npm install && cd ../app && npm install
scripts.headlamp:build: cd headlamp && make backend && make frontend
scripts.install:all: npm run headlamp:install && npm run plugin:install
scripts.build:all: npm run headlamp:build && npm run plugin:build
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others --names "PLUGIN,BACKEND,FRONTEND,APP" -c "cyan,green,yellow,magenta" "npm run plugin:start" "cd headlamp && make run-backend" "cd headlamp && make run-frontend" "cd headlamp && make run-only-app"
